subject: RE: User email address enumeration vulnerability on euronics.ee
bodyHtml: Hello Gregor, Thank you for the information you provided about the vulnerabilities. Some fixes have already been implemented as of today, and a few more changes are planned in the near future by our development team. Once again, thank you for bringing this to our attention. Best regards, Andrei Fjodorov Antista AS Kliendilahenduste ja kvaliteedijuht Laki p√µik 6 12918 Tallinn T +372 640 6400 www.euronics.ee
